attributes.action: Call for a change to the Hague Convention to see Childrens Welfare as paramount importance
attributes.additional_details: At present the Hague Convention doesnot take into consideration the best interests of children involved in international kidnapping, abduction and detaining cases.Not taking into account a child's best interest can have a detrimental effect on them both emotionally and physically. The Hague Convention needs to be redressed and amended to include the child's best interest.
